title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should be accepted and used as a valid filter value without throwing any error message.
SR:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column. 
3. In value1, input the value new Date("3/2/2005"). For example, new Date("3/2/2005").
